name: Ravage Reverie
description:
Ravage Reverie is a point and click game that takes you on adventure. You are playing as Andromeda; a teen girl who lost her memory. Help Andromeda search her surroundings and look for clues that can help recover her memory. Complete the game in various ways to uncover more truths about Andromeda.

-Credits-

*Allen Tieri

*Alex Gonzalez

*Priscilla Velazquez

*Christina Trinidad

*Craig Williams

*Willie Coppage
